content: this legal text involves a case with multiple parties the court dismissed the plaintiffs claim and ordered the dissolution of a community various properties were assigned to different parties and one party was ordered to pay a balance to another party the court also rejected a claim for occupation allowance and ordered one party to pay an indemnity to another party the court discussed the principle of law regarding the use of common property and the payment of compensation the market value of certain properties was determined and the occupation indemnity owed to one party was calculated after deducting certain expenses the court mentioned that the costs of the litigation will be addressed in the final judgment the tribunal dismissed an exception and ordered the dissolution of the community the assets of the community including a warehouse a home with balconies and a cellar compartment a car garage a nude area and cellar rooms were assigned to the parties involved expenses were divided among the parties and one party was responsible for paying the balance to another party the tribunal also rejected a claim for occupation allowance and ordered one party to pay occupation indemnity to another party the case was remanded for further investigation and the preparation of a cadastral fractionation project
